main.name: Jessenia Kahn
main.bio: I'm a technologist with 10 years experience supporting innovative technology solutions for mission-driven companies. I have experience working in the areas of Application Development, Operations, Infrastructure, and Project Management as an individual contributor and technical lead. An avid team player with experience working in globally distributed remote teams, I finds great satisfaction in helping and learning from others. I am a continuous learner and problem solver.
main.contactmessage: Have an inquiry or business opportunity? Get in touch and I'll get back to you as soon as I can!

quotes.text: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.
quotes.user: Viktor E. Frankl, Man's Search for Meaning

quotes.text: That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
